summary: This document outlines the deletion and addition of beneficiaries to The 2013 Butterfly Trust, established by Jeffrey E. Epstein. The current acting trustees, Erika A. Kellerhals and Bella Klein, are authorized to make these changes as per the Trust Agreement dated December 31, 2013.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the Grantor of The 2013 Butterfly Trust, which is the subject of this document.

persons.name: Erika A. Kellerhals
persons.context: Erika A. Kellerhals is one of the current acting trustees of The 2013 Butterfly Trust and is involved in the deletion and addition of beneficiaries.

persons.name: Bella Klein
persons.context: Bella Klein is the other current acting trustee of The 2013 Butterfly Trust, working alongside Erika A. Kellerhals.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned as a trustee of The 2013 Butterfly Trust and is included in the list of beneficiaries being added.

persons.name: Ghislaine N. Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine N. Maxwell is mentioned as a beneficiary being deleted from The 2013 Butterfly Trust.

persons.name: Jean Luc Brunel
persons.context: Jean Luc Brunel is mentioned as a beneficiary being deleted from The 2013 Butterfly Trust.

persons.name: Ann Rodriquez
persons.context: Ann Rodriquez is mentioned as a beneficiary being added to The 2013 Butterfly Trust.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is mentioned as a beneficiary being added to The 2013 Butterfly Trust.

persons.context: Michelle F. Saipher is mentioned as a beneficiary being added to The 2013 Butterfly Trust.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of The 2013 Butterfly Trust, while Erika A. Kellerhals is one of the trustees managing the trust.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of The 2013 Butterfly Trust, while Bella Klein is one of the trustees managing the trust.
Erika A. Kellerhals and Bella Klein are co-trustees of The 2013 Butterfly Trust, working together to manage the trust's beneficiaries.
Richard Kahn is mentioned as a trustee and is also included as a beneficiary being added to the trust.

keyFacts: The document details the deletion of Ghislaine N. Maxwell and Jean Luc Brunel as beneficiaries of The 2013 Butterfly Trust.
Erika A. Kellerhals and Bella Klein are the current acting trustees of The 2013 Butterfly Trust.
New beneficiaries being added include Ann Rodriquez, Darren K. Indyke, Michelle F. Saipher, Richard Kahn, Lisa Kahn, and Paul Barrett.
The trust agreement was originally established on December 31, 2013.
The document was notarized on January 2, 2018.
